[ U ] formal a close relationship with someone in which feelings and thoughts are exchanged: He found spiritual communion with her. He lived in close communion with nature/God.
[ C, + sing/pl verb ] literary a group of people who are united by the same, especially religious, beliefs: The author has a vision of an emerging worldwide Christian communion.
